scripts.build: node checkVersion.js && rm -rf dist && cross-env PROXY_URL=http://test-tfproxy.chanjet.com SOURCEMAP=true VERSIONDETAIL=true node node_modules/tplus-devtools/bin/entry
scripts.local_build: rm -rf dist && cross-env PROXY_URL=http://test-tfproxy.chanjet.com SOURCEMAP=true PUBLIC_URL='' node node_modules/tplus-devtools/bin/entry
scripts.tplus_build: rm -rf dist && cross-env PROXY_URL=http://test-tfproxy.chanjet.com SOURCEMAP=true PUBLIC_URL='/tplus/touch/' BASENAME='/tplus/touch/' node node_modules/tplus-devtools/bin/entry
scripts.tplus_build_win: cross-env PROXY_URL=http://test-tfproxy.chanjet.com SOURCEMAP=true PUBLIC_URL='/tplus/touch/' BASENAME='/tplus/touch/' node node_modules/tplus-devtools/bin/entry
